reviews.text: Great food. The hot table items are always good.  Their eggplant parm one of the best!
Substandard wannabe Italian food made by non-italians. They also have Spanish food that's just as bad as the phoney Italian. Fast service, and slim beverage choices. I don't like this place.
Gross!

A "taste" more akin to bad school cafeteria food and for the same price as if you were at a real deal Italian Restaurant, what a bad joke! The quality of this food is subpar for anyone making it especially  for Latinos, you should be ashamed of yourselves! (I'm of Latiino descent)
Pure overpriced trash, I could still taste the burned (likely canned and expired) sauce and stale cheese!
Never again,  please spend your money on something better! Yuck!
Really good pizza! Fresh and tasty.
Used to order from them all the time for delivery. I live less than a mile away. All of a sudden they start telling me I live too far

Good food and delivery.  It doesn't use those stinky services that that charge as well as force you to tip.  The calzones are made fresh.  all the sandwiches are tremendous and taste great as are the pizzas.  The Stromboli‚Äôs,veal,meatball,chicken and other Hispanic foods are wonderful.

Spanish, not Italian.  Ordered pasta dishes, all were pretty bad.  Photos on menu were fake internet stock photos.  Pasta was al over cooked, chicken was dry and sour, sauce tasted canned, vegetables resembled frozen stuff.

Portions are generous and prices are cheap though, so it‚Äôs good for cheap filler.
